name: Afterlife Crisis
description:
(Web version is broken sorry)

You are trapped in limbo, and in order to reach the afterlife, you need to figure out how you died. Your soul was split in two, and you need to cooperate with yourself to solve the mystery of your murder.

Controls:
WASD to move
Click to interact
TAB to switch characters
SHIFT to sprint
CTRL to crouch
ESC to regain mouse control

Credits:
Duncan - Programmer and World Designer
Max - Artist, Sound Designer, and Story Writer
